ConfigurationOption.Value: select p.personid, mu.userid, p.displayname, p.department, p.supervisor, l.laborcode, r.craft, mu.defstoreroom, mu.defsite, l.worklocation, e.emailaddress, ph.phonenum, p.language, p.locale, p.timezone, mu.loginid, l.orgid, p.personuid from person p left join maxuser mu on p.personid = mu.personid left join labor l on p.personid = l.personid left join email e on e.personid = p.personid and e.isprimary = 1 left join phone ph on ph.personid = p.personid and ph.isprimary = 1 left join laborcraftrate r on r.laborcode = l.laborcode and r.orgid = l.orgid and r.defaultcraft = 1 where p.status = 'ACTIVE' and p.lbl_status = 'A' and l.orgid = 'LBNL'
